website_summaries.verdict: Though it's not as durable as some other customized teeth grinding guards, the Teeth Armor device is an affordable professionally-fitted option that will save you money and visits to the dentist for a similar guard.
pros: Garners praise for its customized fit and affordable price that is a fraction of the cost of other professionally-fitted guards from competitors and dentists
Mid-level firmness that isn't too hard or too soft
cons: Doesn't come with clear instructions for taking an impression
Only available in one firmness/thickness level

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit right, really thick.
customer_reviews.text: The process is good. I was very careful making the mold. The result however isn't right. Something with the guard is definitely off. It fits but there is a LOT of pressure on my teeth. If I sleep with it in all night my teeth are really sore in the morning, thru most of the day. Sleeping is very difficult because of the pressure, so I have to take Benadryl. At this point I've given up using it. I even tried boiling it and re-forming it. It helped a tiny bit but not near enough. I was sad wasting 70 bucks, now that they've upped the price another 20 bucks to 90...well...not worth it
customer_reviews.author: Magneato

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, they can replicate what you can get at the dentist. Too good to be true, as the guard when received back was way too tight and ended up hurting my teeth afterwards. Tried their method of boiling it as recommended by CS, but ultimately was a waste of time. Their customer service was lacking and not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wardlow

customer_reviews.title: Too thick, rigid and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This mouth guard is extremely cheap quality and extremely thick. For its price there are plenty more brands available which are better quality. I’m usually not the one to write reviews. I’ve given this mouth guard more than enough time to settle in and it continues to cause tongue and mouth ulcers due to its rough texture and imperfect mold
customer_reviews.author: Samar

customer_reviews.title: Bad bite + and it works-original one designed by Dentist was 600.00!
customer_reviews.text: Double trouble-I have a bad under bite ( bottom teeth scrape back of top teeth and I grind my teeth. My last guard was hard "plastic" and designed by my dentist-it cost 600.00, and after a year or so it broke in my mouth. I was a bit worried to try this but the price is right so I ordered the least expensive and but it was rubber like and didn't feel strong enough. I then ordered the ticker clear "plastic " one. I have been wearing it every night and it's great! Grinding cushioned, no tinnitus , and no TMJ clicking,
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic alternative!!
customer_reviews.text: As many others have stated, my dentist was going to charge me $750 for a night guard to treat TMJ and teeth chipping from constant clenching and grinding. I could not possibly justify spending that kind of money on a 3 inch piece of plastic despite the benefits. I found this after doing a bit of searching and research and I’m so thrilled that I did! It fits perfectly and is ultra comfortable and I received it quite quickly. I tried another DIY home night guard that was less expensive but it was horribly uncomfortable and didn’t fit right at all. This is worth every cent and then some. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sets faster than 45 sec
customer_reviews.text: The putty set so fast I could not make a full impression of my teeth. Wasted money and frustrated
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied with my experience especially for the price. This mouthguard fits much tighter than my previous ones but I really like the semi hard material. It’s 4 not 5 because it doesn’t quite rest on the roof of my mouth, there’s a gap. I think it will work ok though. I’ll update if that changes.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C.

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it can replace your $400 dentist made night guard.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove. The first try did not work out...I didn't get a deep enough impression. I contacted the company and they arranged for me to get another kit. The second try was better and I recommend the night guard.
customer_reviews.author: Bill N.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was planning to get a Night Guard made at my dentist for $895. That is crazy, but I really needed one. I saw this on Amazon, as well as other companies, but chose this one because of the middle price point and their communication when I asked a question. I received it two days ago and was blown away at the size, texture and fit!!! it was effortless to use and did not bother me at all!!! Would definitely recommend!!!!! Really Happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: nsb

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back USPS certified on the 13th of May.
customer_reviews.text: I send it back the day after I got it. by USPS certified mail with a tracking #. It was awful
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Wadell

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The whole experience was extremely positive. I dealt with Joe who was exceptional with product knowledge and follow up. (He sure has patience, too!) I have many years experience with paying dentists a lot of money for mouth guards which didn't fit well, caused headaches etc.... I am a huge fan of Primdent as they understand the needs of the customer and are able to supply at a reasonable price. If you have a mouth guard which stays in all night, that is a very GOOD sign. I highly recommend purchasing from this very professional company. It was a pleasure from start to finish. I plan on buying several more as back-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product several times before and had excellent results. However, this time, the putty that you blend to use for the impression hardened before I could even get it laid out in the impression tray. No contact information given for questions or issues so finally texted to address given in the instructions but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Meiners

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and service
customer_reviews.text: Probably THE best customer service, fast shipping and quality product I’ve received in many years. The process is simple to make your guard. The turnaround time was much faster than expected. The mouthguard itself is way better than the $400 guard from my dentist (which broke - twice). It not only fits better, but also appears to be of excellent quality. Made in the USA too! Highly recommend you go with this company if you need a mouth guard. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: truthart

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical considering the many OTC mouth guards I’ve attempted, none have been an actual molded make though. This was super easy, quick even the actual guard came back really quick! When I first put the new guard on it felt tight, so I emailed the customer service; they responded super quick! Gave me tips and let me know to message back and let them know how it worked out. I couldn’t be happier and definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh goodnough

customer_reviews.title: Great guard
customer_reviews.text: The guard seems to be made of a high quality material. It is smooth and white. It fits perfectly. The medium firmness seems strong and sturdy, with a little bit of give so that it feels comfortable in the mouth. I gave 4 stars for “easy to use” because I was nervous about making the mold correctly. But I followed the instructions (which are pretty simple) and it worked. There was no adjustment or breaking in period. It was comfortable from the first night. I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy but now it’s peeling
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to make. But now less than 3 months it’s peeling and starting to fall apart. I waited to review after I wore it for a bit. This company is pushy on giving reviews so I wanted to see how it really held up.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smock

customer_reviews.title: practical price for good quality
customer_reviews.text: My dentist made my first night guard and it lasted quite a while, but the cost for a replacement was going to be $500, which was more than I could afford. I did some investigating and decided to give a try at doing my own cast. When I got the finished night guard back and I was pleased with the fit and feel of it. I've been using it for several months now, it has held up very well. I do recommend practicing with the tray before doing the actual cast molding to get used to how to get it in and out of your mouth and how to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: M. Douglas MacIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to paying through the nose
customer_reviews.text: My dentist told me I'm a teeth-grinder so I need one of these, but my dental insurance didn't cover it, so it was going to cost me $400. Would one from the dentist be even more comfortable? Maybe. But this is comfortable enough to sleep while wearing it, so well worth it. Also the process of taking my own impression and sending it in was made very easy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: The night guard fits comfortably which makes it very easy to use every night
customer_reviews.text: My old dentist made night guards for free. My new dentist quoted me $600. Professional Dental lab charged me less than $100. The kit arrived a few days after ordering. The instructions to take an impression were clear with photographs to help. The night guard arrived only a few days after returning the impression in their pre paid mailer. The night guard fits comfortably which makes it very easy to use every night. So far, nothing not to like after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad this exists
customer_reviews.text: It's the quality that you would get at a dentist for a much smaller price because you are taking middle man out of the process. Mine arrived and it was a bit tight so they did some troubleshooting and were willing to send me a whole new kit but it just took time for me to adjust to it really. You can order extras for even cheaper as backups. They were very responsive for support - which makes it an even better value in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Megan A.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, affordable, and worth it
customer_reviews.text: The night guard is sturdy and thick even though it only covers half of the teeth height. The fit is good, doesn't fall out or slip out of place. The instructions on how to go about the fitting was easy to understand. There was confusion on using the fitting molds because the largest size was still too tight for me. Thankfully, selecting the largest mold worked out. Keep this in mind in case you encounter a similar experience selecting the mold size.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Liang

customer_reviews.title: This is a KIT, not a set of teeth guards.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely ridiculous. What is advertised is a full set of teeth guards for night-time use. What was delivered was a set of trays and putty to make only ONE set of impressions for either upper or lower teeth that you then have to mail back in, so that you can receive one guard. I am beyond dissatisfied with this product. And will be getting a refund. False advertising. Don't put a picture of a set of two finished mouthguards, if you only send a KIT for ONE impression.
customer_reviews.author: Beau evans

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mold, Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought to minimize night grinding. The molding process was well explained and easy to do. I dropped it in the mail and had the mouthpiece in about a week. The product is very comfortable and I'm sleeping well. The actual material is somewhat soft. Not as soft as a sports mouthguard, but not as hard other night guards I've had. I'm taking to my dentist next week to get her opinion, but personally, I'm impressed. Custom guards like this from the dentist are around $250. This was $70.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Wow Wow Wow
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this company is fantastic. I received the 2mm and the 3mm. Both sets were extremely well made. I had a call from customer service that helped me with my questions. These were just as good, if not better, then the $400 set from my dentist. In fact, a neighbor of mine used to own a dental lab and he approved of this company. I have already suggested my daughter purchase her mouth guard from this company. Outstanding product and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation with the picture
customer_reviews.text: Honestly thought these were thin and clear. Hell no, they were thicc and frosty color
customer_reviews.author: Jose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Came out perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bite guard was exactly what I needed. Making the impression was easy enough. A bit of a challenge keeping within the time limit for mixing the 2 compounds, but pre planning and set up helped a lot. The guard was back very quickly. I didn't count the days, but a week or so was all. And the fit is perfect. Very comfortable to wear and is working out well. Thank you!! And so glad that Amazon keeps track of my purchases so it will be easy to reorder when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M Mercier

customer_reviews.title: really great, especially for the cost
customer_reviews.text: this was just as nice as my dentist created mouthguard, and about 4 times cheaper. If there was a latch on the mouthguard to protect it from dogs, that would be even better. but, then you'd deprive your dog of its favorite expensive dog chew.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have ground through four bite guards from my orthodontist and couldn't keep the one the dentist gave me in my mouth all night. This is thicker than the standard ($300) guard I get from the ortho, but still fits snugly on my teeth, keeping it in place all night. I still have one of the thinner guards for my bottom teeth, and that helps, but this guard has been a lifesaver! I am ordering another to wear while during the day when I'm working at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and it’s a perfect fit. Not too thick like I had seen on other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I received my nightguard that I have so anxiously waited for since breaking my hard and well chewed one made at my dental office. This one is far better than the one I had before and can already tell that it’s a perfect fit. The process was very easy. I took the mold the day it arrived and sent it back the same day. That was less than a week ago and now it is here. I’m a nice little case. I wish I had taken them up on the increased order for a discount when I sent my order in. Maybe they will remind me how to do that. Happy customer here!
customer_reviews.author: HWslp

customer_reviews.title: May move teeth like invisalign braces
customer_reviews.text: This product is a good fit for a night guard, it is very tight to the point it feels like it moves my teeth like the invisalign braces. Its is a hard shell I wear for my upper teeth. The item came before the promised time from Amazon and once received and sent to company I received the actual guard brace 2 days before the promised date. This is my second pair, not that it wore out but because I lost the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.  Flexible.  Not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly I was a little worried when I had to make my own mold and mail it back to have the night guard made. But I just got the finished product and must say it’s very comfortable. Not too bulky. Flexible material. It even came with a storage case. My dentist wanted to make a custom one and with insurance my cost was going to be $375! This is every bit as good as the previous custom ones I’ve gotten. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Buglewicz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I grind my teeth at night and have gone through many night guards. OTC night guards are bulky and are hard to mold. I have gotten several night guards from the dentist paying upwards of $300 each time with insurance. I was absolutely pleased with this product! Mold was easy to do and then you ship it off and your new guard shows up within about a week. Definitely worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirlina

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were easy to follow. I got a daytime guard as well as a medium density one, both are very good quality. Customer service was also great. I ordered these guards right after moving and accidentally put an old address in. A company representative called me and sent it to my address at no charge, super nice. I'll definitely ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: GG8

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Directions for making the form to send in was very thorough and I had no trouble at all. Filled out my information on paper they gave me with my form in the prepaid envelope. Night guard came way sooner than I expected. Feels way more comfortable than the rubbery kind that you put in hot water and form. I gave it 4 stars just because I t’ll take a bit getting used to, but is way better than anything I’ve purchased in stores. Very happy with my purchase and will definitely help with my teeth grinding I do all night while sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time. It was so hard to use. The mouth guard to make impression didn't fit my month. The paste dried yo quickly so I could not do impressions. It's not like I can return item! Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Garza

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: The good news is they were quick to get the guard sent to me after I sent in the mold. That's about it, though. The guard was tight and I woke up with very sore teeth. I tried the boil method. Didn't work. I was told by customer service to send it back so they could trim it. They trimmed it and it was worse. They agreed to send me a new kit. I did that. Still waiting. It had been months. I give up. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Cumwar

customer_reviews.title: Great product, outstanding customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd puppy chewed up my professional dentist made teethhguard...arrrgh!! Didn't want to spend another $500 to get replacement so I ordered this, a little skeptical about the process & quality, but for the price decided to try it. Received my impression kit in mail, took imprint (totally easy), sent it back & received my trays a week later. Trays = good quality & firm ( Med firmness) although the fit wasn't perfect. I emailed them & they promptly sent new impression kit & will re-engineer the trays for me! Outstanding customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is great option for those of us who need a nighttime guard and don’t want to pay the high fee at the dentist. The instructions were easy to follow. You get an option to get a second guard for a reduced price which I take. They each vine with a case. This is the second time I’ve ordered this guard. They last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Right product, right price.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for at the price I wanted to pay. I used the small looks and fortunately there was enough. " Stuff" for a do-over as my first attempt didn't come out right. All else was great. It would be great though, if they gave you the option of storing your mold AFTER you had the finished product, not before.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Gepner

customer_reviews.title: So Happy.
customer_reviews.text: I just got my new Night Guard today. I really appreciate the help and advice from their sales department. It fits really well and I'm glad I went up to the stronger one. Solid yet still soft on the outside so it does not feel like I will crack a tooth if I bite down to hard. I'm actually using my voice to text right now and can talk fine. What more can one ask for. Much better than the way to hard one I got from my dentist for $500
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Just like from the dentist at a fraction of the price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. You make this teeth gaurd just like in the dentist's office with a tray and hardening putty, but you do it all yourself. And you receive in return a night gaurd that is exactly like you would receive from the dentist, whose cost would have been better than $300. So, don't hesitate, get this one at a fraction of the price. P.S. I've been wearing this at night for a couple of months now and it remains as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: drbink

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after I bit through the $200 one I got from my dentist. I got the soft flexible one. Making the mold was easy and I got my night guard less than 2 weeks later. It fits great and is thicker than the one I got from the dentist so hopefully I won’t bite through it in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: high quality custom night guards for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I lost some custom made night guards that I'd gotten from my dentist, and went looking for replacements. i did the quickie "boil and fit" model from CVS which was fine for the short term, but wanted something more customer. Sent my info to this company and a few days later I got a mold in the mail, exact same thing I've done before at the dentist, Popped it in the mail and maybe 10 days letter I got my custom night guards and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why the high ratings... Got the medium-hardness one and the edges were SO rough, they were bothersome to my gums and tongue. You could see they were filed off, NOT carefully. Plastic/resin got scratches and dents after the first use. Their customer service was good though, quick response to my refund request but the guard was not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The initial guard wouldn't fit, they called me to talk about the fit, and options we had to try to get the guard just right. They re-sent me a kit and added some trimming options to make sure the guard would work out. Can't complain!
customer_reviews.author: Joey Perry

customer_reviews.title: Very painful and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mouth guard I received was so tight that it felt like it was pulled backwards on my two front teeth. I woke up feeling so much pain that once I removed the mouth guard, I couldn’t eat anything for at least 6 hours because my teeth were still in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mireille P

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like what you get at the dentist for 1/4 of the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly like my night guard from the dentist, which cost $350. This was a way better deal. It was easy to make the mold of my teeth with the simple instructions. It fits perfectly. It isn't bulky (though I did put a note in my package asking them to make it as thin as possible, which may or may not have influenced the end product I received). I highly recommend getting one of these rather than overpaying at the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: or maybe not

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the bottom and top mouthsplints because of tmj. My tmj specialist office quoted me $700 per splint, so this was a tremendous savings. I had problems with both splints being too tight and I emailed the company on both splints and they were very responsive. They instructed me how to make adjustments at home and it worked for the bottom splint but not for the top one, s the mailed me a new kit. I'm very pleased with the savings and the great customer service. Thank you. This has helped me manage the tmj pianos much.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia V.

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised that it turned out so well ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that it turned out so well. Very professional and does the job. I am a clencher and it relaxes my jaw allowing me to sleep better.
customer_reviews.author: vmb$

customer_reviews.title: Has helped with TMJ and teeth grinding
customer_reviews.text: I really like this and had helped tremendously with night time grinding and much better then the store bought ones that dont last but 2 months. And was much much cheaper then the dentist made ones. When or if I wear this one out I would definitely buy another. I dont see me having to buy another for a long time. The only thing I didnt like was the trays are big and bit uncomfortable for the couple mintues to make the mold but worth it to get this
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Firs well and works
customer_reviews.text: But i don’t know how long it will last as i’ve only had it a couple of weeks and it is showing wear. Will try and remember yo update in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: First of all it’s really a wonderful mouthfuard it fits great has smooth edges and you get very used to wearing it. But the reason for less than perfect review is, it came with a little crack in it, I figured it wouldn’t really bother me, but I notice I keep finding it and the edge of the crack is sharp, it takes so long to actually receive the mouth guard that I didn’t have enough time to test it out and see before my window to return it was already expired. Anyway I probably won’t buy another, as I feel the $5.00 local can be made to fit just as nice
customer_reviews.author: caleb audette

customer_reviews.title: Great Night Guard
customer_reviews.text: This night guard is just as good as my previous one that I purchased from my dentist for several hundred dollars. It fits well and helps with my TMJ. I would recommend it if you want one personally fitted to your mouth. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: AMCow

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was never really happy with my hard plastic night guard. This guard is medium hard and perfect. Hard enough to handle teeth grinding and clenching but soft enough for comfort. Customer service is excellent! They respond quickly and will do whatever it takes to make you happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bob's Your Uncle

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: I've had many mouth guards over the years and this is by far the best fit I've ever had. It's even better than the one the dentist made and at only a fraction of the price. The entire process was easy and when I had a question while I was waiting for the guard to be shipped, the seller responded quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Chela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product at an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about an at home mold kit, but the instructions are super easy to follow. I received my night guard so fast and I was shocked at how perfectly it fit! It’s not bulky and fits my teeth so well. I’m so disappointed that I didn’t find this product sooner. I was paying hundreds of dollars a year for a night guard from my dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I have rarely experienced such a perfect product and such excellent service. I lost my $500 night guard that I bought from my dentist. My guess is that toddlers took it off my bathroom sink, thinking it was a mouthpiece for Halloween, and it's probably buried among boxes of legos and toys. I received the kit in two days, made the impression, and received a PERFECT fitting night guard eight days later. If only I had known about Dental Lab Custom Teeth Night Guard before my dentist's excessively expensive one. Thank you Dental Lab for all you do!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Pleased 1 week in!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for a few weeks. I had no issues with size or bulkiness and would say I have an average mouth size. I would always (unknowingly) rip my in-store guards out at some point during the night. No issues here. They send multiple sized molds to best fit your mouth. I can’t speak to it’s long-term help, but for now very satisfied. I clean every night with Listerine and water.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Konecny

customer_reviews.title: Save me a lot of Money
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended me get a night guard. She was going to give me one for three hundred bucks you know the custom fitted. But this one is custom-fitted and fits my mouth perfectly not as comfortable as not having one in at all but it does stop the night grinding and it was a good value.
customer_reviews.author: T Green

customer_reviews.title: After several months it's still working for me
customer_reviews.text: It's always been too tight for my sensitive teeth. I tried their suggestion of moulding it with hot water and that didn't work so I took my knife to it. Trimmed half of the material off the upper front of the guard and that worked. The guard is tight enough on my back teeth that even with my trim job it still stays on my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Knowing I have a backup helps me sleep better also. I noticed a rough spot on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a month ago to replace the guard chewed up by my dog. Dentist price was $500. This one plus another backup copy made from the same mold has saved me hundreds. Knowing I have a backup helps me sleep better also. I noticed a rough spot on the inside of my first guard. This company offered to clean it up for me. I'll be sending it in for service when I get my backup copy in a few days. This guard is softer than the one I got from the dentist and is more comfortable but it seems to be just as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Best of the BEST Mouth Guard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had four night guards from the dentist. This is the most comfortable and well-fitting ever, at a fraction of the cost! I’m incredibly impressed. It was easy to take the moulding. Fast and Perfect. This will be my Company forever!
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH Z

customer_reviews.title: SO IMPRESSED!  Saved me over $400 over my dentist.
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended a night guard for me and quoted $480 (not covered by dental insurance). That was completely out of the question for my budget. I looked on Amazon and found this product. The impression kit arrived the day after I ordered it and the instructions were very clear and the process was easy. I mailed it off the next day and received my mouth guard within 7-10 days. It fits PERFECTLY and is very comfortable. I am so impressed by this product and the customer service/instructions! Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: It was really easy to make the mold- truly less than 5 minutes. They sent out a dental guard right away. I personally found it to be too thick for my comfort but they were able to solve that problem right away. I use it now every night and it doesn't fall off or feel bulky. I would recommend getting the 1mm thickness if you're sensitive and don't grind very hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: guard Very superior to the do-it-yourself  guard
customer_reviews.text: This guard is much better quality and fits better than the less expensive guards which you mold yourself by heating up the material in your microwave. I’ve tried both and hands down this guard made in a dental lab is superior to the “do-it-yourself” kit.
customer_reviews.author: James E Martinez

customer_reviews.title: So thankful I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thankful I found this! I’ve needed a night guard for year and years since my dog ate the one got from the dentist. This was so affordable and exactly like the one I had when I was little, that cost hundreds of dollars! The molds were super easy and I got my night guards super fast! It has been so easy to get used to and I no longer am able to grind my teeth!
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: CUSTOM FIT !
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the feel & fit of this night guard. Did not have to get used to this in the least. The fit is perfect! Have had several mouth guards over the years spending more than the cost of this one. There is really no need to spend more , just use this lab.
customer_reviews.author: Moma mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good guard
customer_reviews.text: The fit was PERFECT ! Was concerned, because my local dentist wanted $500 for the same thing ?! I followed all the instructions to a T ! ....and it fits and works Super on the upper teeth.
customer_reviews.author: baldeagleNC

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick alternative to dentist night guard.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent night guard, The process couldn't be simpler, The kit arrived very quickly from amazon. The Impression was very easy to make and send back. The final product arrived in the mail a few weeks later. Fits perfectly, and very comfortable to wear. Customer service was very accommodating, and easy to deal with. I highly recommend this night guard as an alternative to the version your dentist would create.
customer_reviews.author: Maish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great product, and great service would recommend to anyone who has a unique smile and has issues with over the counter retainers. I would recommend this to anyone who was looking for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: N.L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing does your job and pretty fast delivery. I grind my teeth in my sleep this is the best method to prevent my teeth from cracking all over I sleep with it got it I've not had jaw pain or any other problems
customer_reviews.author: Greengiant

customer_reviews.title: Woke up with a sore mouth!
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt fit quite right. My teeth go in, but it feels like there’s too much tension. I tried sleeping a couple nights with it in & woke up both nights with sore teeth/mouth... like as if I just got braces! Is there a way to correct this?
customer_reviews.author: sxw0n

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade if you grind
customer_reviews.text: I bit through it after less than an month of use. Now my veneer on my upper canine is a little cracked. I got the basic gaurd. I didn't realize it was not hard/firm. I should have upgraded to the more durable option.
customer_reviews.author: Really

customer_reviews.title: Painful
customer_reviews.text: This product for my upper arch is so uncomfortable causes more pain than the initial problem that it was purchased for!!!! DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved my mouthguard and unfortunately the fit isn't great. Emailed customer service and they told me to out it in a hot water and it should mold to the shape. This didnt work. With all the great reviews I expected to have a good product. I am disappointed and unsatisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one I purchased from the dentist.
customer_reviews.text: Granted the one I purchased from my dentist was decades ago, but this is so much more comfortable than that one. This one cost me approximately 10% of what my dentist wanted for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fits very well
customer_reviews.text: My last nightguard was ordered through my dentist and cost me around $300. It never fit right and tore my gums up for years as they didn't do a good job trimming the edges. This one fits great is very comfortable and was so much cheaper. I was nervous about doing the mold myself but it was very easy and obviously since it fits perfectly my mold was a success. Highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: First time having a custom made night guard. Never going back!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is as good as the over the counter types but the fact that is made to my teeth/mouth, makes it so comfortable. It really only covers your teeth (not the gums) which makes it super comfortable to use. The process is very simple and I will definitely be wearing my night guard daily now.
customer_reviews.author: Berenice A. Carstetter

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, FAST
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make molds, written instructions and a video provided. Easy to ship envelope and quick to make and ship fished Gaurd. Fits great, looking fwd to relief from my clenching headaches.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Dental Teeth Nightguard
customer_reviews.text: The product has to be made by yourself. Which I did not Know how there was no instructions available.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Sacay

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I love the low profile guard. The impression kit was very easy to use and the lab got me my mold quickly. I lost my beloved guard while traveling. I contacted the company and they are placing it at a discount because they store my impression. Amazing customer service! Check out teethnightguard.com for more products and customization options. I wish I would have ordered my original from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great value - and same quality as much higher price ones
customer_reviews.text: I was going to get a night guard from my dentist, then realized they weren't covered by insurance, and I didn't want to pay the $400++ This was a great alternative to achieve the same results. Doing the mold was fairly simple and the end product was a good fit and seems to be very durable.
customer_reviews.author: R. Myers

customer_reviews.title: SO MUCH CHEAPER and quicker than the dentist!
customer_reviews.text: This is FANTASTIC. My husband and I both got these through our insurance and even with our insurance( mine was about 120) and my husbands was about 250! And it is LITERALLY the exact same but dare I say better? The putty they use to make the mold doesn’t chock you/isn’t as uncomfy as the one at the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: YouStoleMyShirts

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly & Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The mold was easy to make and the guard arrived quickly. It fit my teeth perfectly and wasn't uncomfortable. The guard was much lighter than I expected and I didn't notice it while falling asleep. Much more comfortable than a regular sports mouth guard. It also came with a case to store during the day which I found to be useful. Would recommend to anyone looking for a durable and affordable solution to teeth grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and a good product
customer_reviews.text: I believe this was accurately represented. The customer service in my case was outstanding. And their attention to detail very good. Are used to make these night guards myself. This one was thicker than I I’ve been used to but Feels like it will hold up long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen m.

customer_reviews.title: ... was just as described and I now have a comfortable, well fitting night guard to keep me from ...
customer_reviews.text: The process was just as described and I now have a comfortable, well fitting night guard to keep me from clenching and grinding my teeth at night. I tried several heat in the microwave and then try to fit my upper teeth, but they were too uncomfortable to wear. My dentist charges $300 for a custom fit night guard. I am pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone that grinds and or clinches their teeth at night.
customer_reviews.author: P Gent

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, perfect fit, well made, strong material!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. It has just the right blend of toughness and flexibility to make it long lasting and comfortable. Since it is formed precisely to my teeth, it stays in place. The online video instructions on how to make a perfect impression were very helpful. I love this night guard and I am sure it has saved my teeth and jaw. Thank you for this awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Renee M Amator

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The company bent over backwards to help me get the right fit. First one didn't work out so they sent me an entirely new kit at no expense to me. I wrote a few details of the issues I was having with the original when I sent the second imprint back and the company called me to understand the issue better. The second guard is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This helped tremendously with my jaw pain. My dentist recommended a $600 night guard which was out of my budget. Really glad this one works so well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Garmon

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my mouth guard. I have gotten ones from the dentist that cost hundreds of dollars. They were rigid and hard and uncomfortable. One cracked because it rocked in my mouth. This is a bit soft and very comfortable. And a lot less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: joschmo

customer_reviews.title: A must buy now
customer_reviews.text: What am awesome product. The price is great. Stop being taken by overpriced dentist and buy this instead. I will buy again and again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: A better and less expensive alternative.
customer_reviews.text: The product ordered and was received as described. It's one of the easiest set up for those not wanting to pay the HIGH cost of mouth guards offered by your dentist. Why pay hundreds of dollars for something that cost much less and does the same thing. Just takes a little bit of your time.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Save your money at the dentist!! Get this instead
customer_reviews.text: SUPER fast shipping for both the impression set and return guard. It’s nice and soft and perfectly molded. As good as my $500 one I got from the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: ❤️ my new night guard! Just what I needed without the time and money involved with the dentist. I accidentally threw my 1st one away in a pile of paper towels. Customer service was great, one e mail and my 2nd one was on its way. Will definitely purchase from them in the future very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Okay. A little thick.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine except the first time when you put it on it felt to thick that you could barely close your month. But when you are used to it, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fye

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a sports mouthguard
customer_reviews.text: It's quite large and bulky. Wish I had spent the $300+ for the dentist-grade version instead
customer_reviews.author: Alexis H.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further then this company if you need a mouth guard.
customer_reviews.text: Great product at an affordable price. Purchased one 2 years ago and has worked excellent and now purchased a new one. Quick turnaround. I had a question I emailed the company about and they were quick to respond.
customer_reviews.author: DonBoe

customer_reviews.title: The whole process was extremely easy and fast.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $400 for a guard from my dentist years ago. Hard to believe I received the same exact result from this product at a very low price. The mold was perfectly done to my teeth. The guard fit to a "T"!!! I would recommend this company anytime. Also, They contacted me when I ordered a second pair and was confused on my order. Very nice, friendly and professional.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: At first it was a bit hard to get used to. I felt like my bite was off for a couple of days after wearing it at night. Now everything seems to be fine. Much better than spending $500 at the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Instruction for taking mold was very easy to follow. The night guard fits perfectly and and is very comfortable. Does not slip or fall out while sleeping and does not interfere with my CPAP. No difference from the ones I have received from the Dentist, except the price. Hundreds cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: BH

product_meta.title: Dental Lab Custom Teeth Night Guard - Medium Firmness(not a hard guard) UPPER TEETH - Protect Teeth From Grinding, Clenching, Bruxism - Medium Density - Soft but Strong Teeth Mouth Guard
feature_bullets: UPPER TEETH Medium Density Soft But Strong (firmer then a soft guard but NOT a hard guard)Custom Made Teeth Night Guard For UPPER TEETH: Thickness is .120'' (3mm) Made from medium density BPA and Latex free medical grade material - Same material used by dentists
Experience: Order dental lab direct from a lab with over 10 years experience in fabricating custom dental guards.
Attention To Detail: Each and every teeth guard is hand made with attention to detail to ensure a precise fitting teeth guard.
Material Matters: We use Medium Density anti abrasive material that is not only strong and durable but provides optimal comfort

Quality and Guarantee: Not a cheap boil and bite bulky mouth guard - What you receive is a professional custom teeth guard that fits exact to your teeth - 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - UNLIMITED ADJUSTMENTS(97% of time fits perfect right away) - WE WILL DO WHATEVER IT TAKES TO MAKE SURE YOUR A SATISFIED CUSTOMER
